title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 527.7 - Authorization of qualified persons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 527.7 - Authorization of qualified persons

State Regulations

The board shall certify that a person is authorized to assist
claimants in the preparation of claims for presentation to the board, and to
grant emergency awards on behalf of a local program upon receipt of: (a) such person's affirmation that he/she is
employed by or volunteers at a victim services program; and
(b) the affirmations of such person and the
head of such victim services program that he/she is knowledgeable in the
provisions of article 22 of the Executive Law and Parts 525, 526 and 527 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
527.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
